# ServiceDto.Validate method

Validates the DTO.

```csharp
public virtual bool Validate(out string errorMessage)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| errorMessage | The error message if the DTO is invalid, `null` otherwise. |

## Return Value

True if the DTO is valid.
